verses.kjv: Unto thee will I cry, O LORD my rock; be not silent to me: lest, if thou be silent to me, I become like them that go down into the pit.
verses.ct: I'm calling out to you, LORD, my rock. Don't stay silent toward me, because if you refuse to answer me, I'll end up like those who descend into the grave.

verses.kjv: Hear the voice of my supplications, when I cry unto thee, when I lift up my hands toward thy holy oracle.
verses.ct: Listen to my desperate pleas as I cry out to you, as I raise my hands toward your holy sanctuary.

verses.kjv: Draw me not away with the wicked, and with the workers of iniquity, which speak peace to their neighbours, but mischief is in their hearts.
verses.ct: Don't drag me away along with the wicked, along with those who practice evil â€” people who talk friendly with their neighbors while harboring malice in their hearts.

verses.kjv: Give them according to their deeds, and according to the wickedness of their endeavours: give them after the work of their hands; render to them their desert.
verses.ct: Repay them for what they've done, for the evil of their actions. Pay them back for the work of their hands; give them exactly what they deserve.

verses.kjv: Because they regard not the works of the LORD, nor the operation of his hands, he shall destroy them, and not build them up.
verses.ct: Since they pay no attention to what the LORD has done or to what his hands have accomplished, he will tear them down and never rebuild them.

verses.kjv: Blessed be the LORD, because he hath heard the voice of my supplications.
verses.ct: Praise the LORD, because he has listened to my desperate pleas.

verses.kjv: The LORD is my strength and my shield; my heart trusted in him, and I am helped: therefore my heart greatly rejoiceth; and with my song will I praise him.
verses.ct: The LORD is my strength and my shield. My heart trusted in him, and I received his help. So my heart overflows with joy, and I will praise him with my song.

verses.kjv: The LORD is their strength, and he is the saving strength of his anointed.
verses.ct: The LORD is the strength of his people, and he is the saving refuge of his anointed one.

verses.kjv: Save thy people, and bless thine inheritance: feed them also, and lift them up for ever.
verses.ct: Rescue your people and bless those who belong to you. Be their shepherd and carry them forever.
